heading: LearnRoom
previewTitle: Where teaching and learning come together
previewDescription: Your all-in-one place for teaching and learning. Easy-to-use and secure tool that helps educators manage, measure, and enrich learning experiences.
description1: Bring all your learning tools together and manage multiple classes in one central destination.
description2: Anyone in your school community can get up and running with Classroom in minutes.
description3: Work simultaneously and connect face-to-face with Google Meet.
description4: Empower teaching and learning from anywhere, on any device, and give your class more flexibility.
textButton.content1: Use existing content or create sets from scratch
textButton.content4: View automated insights of assignment performance trends
textButton.content5: Build student confidence with immediate feedback
textButton.content6: Ensure student access to resources anytime
textButton.content7: Provide individual guidance with prompts, encouragement, and automated hints
textButton.content8: Enable students to show work so teachers better understand their thinking
textButton.content9: Access a built-in resource section with skill cards and video tutorials
textButton.content10: Empower students to check their answers to know if they are on the right track
textButton.content11: Ensure support for multiple input devices that allow for handwriting, drawing, and symbolic expressions
name: Name
